lead_paragraph: Stocks closed higher as traders responded to some encouraging earnings and deal news. Technology and health care companies rose more than most.

headline.print_headline: Tech and Health Shares Lead Market to a Small Gain
headline.main: Wall St. Is Up on Earnings and Deal News

snippet: Stocks closed higher as traders responded to some encouraging earnings and deal news. Technology and health care companies rose more than most.
abstract: Stocks rise moderately in widespread rally.
